controller.render.bee.geometry: q.is_name_any('Omnibee') ? geometry.omnibee : ( q.is_name_any('Wrapped') ? geometry.wrapped : ( q.is_name_any('Invincibee') ? geometry.invincibee : ( q.is_name_any('smol') ? Geometry.smolbee :(Geometry.default))))
textures: q.is_name_any('Omnibee') ? texture.omnibee : ( q.is_name_any('Wrapped') ? texture.wrapped : ( q.is_name_any('Invincibee') ? texture.invincibee : ( (array.skins[query.property('minecraft:has_nectar') + query.is_angry * 2]))))
